Text.Page:
Kaidun! The name holds many meanings for we amani. Once he was a symbol of our glory and strength. Those days are long gone.

Kaidun emerged from the Citadel of Torment a mad, ruthless tyrant. He conquered Mount Tyrannasâ€”and without the sacrifice of our people, he'd be right here slaughtering us all.

The battle has dragged on so long, we are in dire need of supplies. We have soldiers, but no way to arm them.

Bring us weapons. I don't care how. In fact, if you should pry them from the cold, dead hands of {@LinkCreature:32#1#Sihran fighters} and {@LinkCreature:32#2#tuwangi hornheads}, I'd be downright pleased.

Great job! Thanks to you, our new recruits will be armed with high-quality weapons.

Knowing our enemies will be punished with their own weapons brings a smile to my face.
Find the {@LinkCreature:32#1#Sihran fighters} and {@LinkCreature:32#2#tuwangi hornheads} around Daunting Pass east of here. We need their weapons.
